APP.ERROR.404.HELP:
Are you sure you entered the right URL? You can also use the menu above to look around.
If the site seems broken, please contact us using the feedback button on the bottom.
APP.ERROR.404.MESSAGE: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for!
APP.ERROR.404.TITLE: Not Found
APP.GLOBAL.NOTIFICATION.MESSAGE.SERVER_N: It seems as if the service is not reachable. This may be either due to a downtime of the service or because of your internet connection.
APP.GLOBAL.TITLE: Elektra Initiative
APP.HOME.HEADLINE.HOWITWORKS: Want to see how it works?
APP.HOME.HEADLINE.SLOGAN.SECOND: Elektra - the configuration framework for everyone
APP.HOME.HEADLINE.SLOGAN.THIRD: Elektra’s core is fast, without dependencies, cross-platform, and all parts are 100% free software (BSD licensed).
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.1.DETAILS: Elektra stores configuration in a global, hierarchical key database. Mount configuration files into the hierarchy, safely edit configuration, and introspect current settings. kdb (1) provides easy access. See the glossary for terminology.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.1.HEADLINE: Global Key Database
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.2.DETAILS: Nearly all functionality of Elektra is implemented in plugins which can be combined to powerful functionality. Declaratively specify your favourite configuration format, default settings, and validation for your application!
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.2.HEADLINE: Extendability
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.3.DETAILS: Flexibly change between many common and important configuration formats: TOML, JSON,XML, and even special configuration files like /etc/hosts and many others using Augeas. Tip: export, import, and 3-way merge is available, too.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.3.HEADLINE: Human-readable Configuration Files
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.4.DETAILS: Automate configuration tasks with powerful tools, check from which file an applications will receive settings, surf through configuration with GUIs, and notify other applications about configuration changes.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.4.HEADLINE: Batteries Included
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.5.DETAILS: Validate configuration immediately on changes, eliminate your configuration duplicates with the help of symbolic links or compute configuration parameters from other configuration values.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.5.HEADLINE: Configuration Specification
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.6.DETAILS: Make maintenance of your application easier and utilize all of Elektra’s features by elektrification of your application. We have written a tutorial for you, which explains how to do that!
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.6.HEADLINE: Elektrify your Application
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.7.DETAILS: The Elektra core is written without external dependencies and with high regard to good performance.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.7.HEADLINE: Fast Without Dependencies
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.8.DETAILS: Thanks to all components being licensed under the BSD license, Elektra comprises only of free software.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.8.HEADLINE: 100% Free Software
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.9.DETAILS: Elektra strives to eliminate cross-platform related issues and is therefore suitable for all systems.
APP.HOME.LABEL.KEYFACT.9.HEADLINE: Cross-platform
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.1.DETAILS: You need help in developing a custom plugin? You want move unmaintained configuration code to us? Check out the plugin tutorial! Make sure to report an issue before: we can help or maybe even do it for you.
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.1.HEADLINE: Develop Custom Plugins
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.2.DETAILS: Of course you can use Elektra also outside a C or C++ environment. Have a look at our language bindings! You can even write plugins in Java, Ruby, Python, Lua and Kotlin.
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.2.HEADLINE: Use Elektra outside C/C++
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.3.DETAILS: Of course we can! An initiative like Elektra asks periodically for decisions. We wrote a book explaining all the scientific background. We welcome everyone to join the discussions!
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.3.HEADLINE: Can you Elaborate on the Why?
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.4.DETAILS: Elektra is available in most distributions like Fedora, Gentoo, Arch Linux, Debian, Ubuntu, Openwrt, OpenSuse, PLDLinux, Linux Mint, and OpenWRT. See our installation instructions for a full list.
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.4.HEADLINE: Availability
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.5.DETAILS: Utilize Elektra’s code generator to generate high-level and type-safe configuration access code based on the same specification as used for validation.
APP.HOME.LABEL.ORIENTATION.5.HEADLINE: Code Generation
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.OTHERS.DETAILS: Many applications already use Elektra, as listed here. In the right you see a screenshot of the KDE KolorManager using Elektra.
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.OTHERS.HEADLINE: Applications
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.QTGUI.DETAILS: Elektra offers a GUI based on Qt Quick. It simplifies common tasks and offers easy access to the key database itself. A description for the GUI tool can be found here.
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.QTGUI.HEADLINE: Graphical User Interface
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.WEBGUI.DETAILS: The Web UI allows remote configuration of multiple Elektra instances. Furthermore, the Web UI generates special input fields from metadata, making it harder to make mistakes when configuring programs.
APP.HOME.LABEL.TOOL.WEBGUI.HEADLINE: Web UI
